title: ICT-Integrated Blended Learning Design Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of basic educational methodologies, social studies content, and fundamental digital device utilization
context.additional_context: A course for pre-service teachers to cultivate blended lesson design and ICT tool application skills using LMS and personal devices

learning_goals: Learners can select at least three ICT tools suitable for social studies classes and design implementation plans.
A teaching-learning design can be developed to apply blended learning models (rotation, flex, etc.) to social studies classes
An online-offline integrated assessment tool using an LMS can be created and utilized for formative assessment
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
